roleset.name: to make to convert to carbon
roleset.note: CARBONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'carbonize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VerbNet. VN 45.4. Comparison with 'carbonify.' (from carbonize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: The fill of both pits contained carbonized material, and samples from both pits were therefore wet sieved.
